rows.label: qst000603_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you're here. The
repairs are already done.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0002
rows.name:
My motto is Skill, Speed,
and Savings! Please continue
to patronize my shop!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, Driver-san. Thank you so much.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanks to you, the stove is
so clean it looks brand new.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0005
rows.name:
Looking at this stove reminds
me of when he gave it to me.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0006
rows.name:
No matter how many years pass, our
love remains unchanged. It burns strong,
just like the fire in this stove.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0007
rows.name:
I wish my husband would come home
soon. I'd put my heart and soul
into making him a special pie.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh yes, this pie is a tradition
passed down in my family...

rows.label: qst000603_msg0009
rows.name:
Oops, I was about to
go on and on again.

rows.label: qst000603_msg0010
rows.name:
Now then, I did say I'd give
you a generous reward...

rows.label: qst000603_msg0011
rows.name:
Just treating you to a slice of
my pie won't be enough, will it?

rows.label: qst000603_msg0012
rows.name:
I'll give you this. The
recipe for my specialty pie!

rows.label: qst000603_msg0013
rows.name:
With this recipe, you can enjoy the
taste of my specialty pie anytime!
